isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - ELECTRIC WINDOW AND/OR ELECTRIC DOOR LOCK SWITCH ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: ELECTRIC WINDOW AND/OR ELECTRIC DOOR LOCK SWITCH ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Install Driver Side Electric Window and/or Electric Door Lock Switch Assembly
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 59 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Position electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly (Item 1) into place on upper door trim panel (Item 3) and install two pan head mach. screws (Item 2) and tighten. Then connect electric window and/or electric door lock switch connectors (Item 7, Figure 55) to back of electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly.

Install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly onto cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Install Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

svcsubproc.title: Install Passenger Side Electric Window and/or Electric Door Lock Switch Assembly
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 60 for Items in parentheses unless otherwise noted.

step1.para: Position electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly (Item 1) into place on upper door trim panel (Item 3) and install two pan head mach. screws (Item 2) and tighten. Then connect electric window and/or electric door lock switch connectors (Item 7, Figure 56) to back of electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly.

Install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly onto cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Install Passenger Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.
